ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Jeevith Saravanan Janakiraman has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 12 years. During his last employment he was working as a Senior Specialist at HCL. Jeevith has extensive knowledge of Lotus Notes/Domino, Lotus QuickPlace, Traveler, Microsoft Exchange Server, BlackBerry, Wintel, WebSphere MQ Portal, LDAP, IBM WebSphere. So far Jeevith has not gained any managerial experience.
